entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Valemount
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 3. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then cloudy with light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 10 February 2023
